post.body: Yeah, it's great for small product lines. How many products do you need it to support?
@TheStrayMuse is right. You're a real douche bag.
Shit. I think @TheStrayMuse must've taken too many drugs at home today. She thinks she's the cat.
Good call.
@splorp Have you looked at http://bigcartel.com ?
Nice! This album is great to work to.
Good. You just work on getting healthy. :)
Did you decide to stay at home today?
Amen.
I guess so. I could probably go down to the 2nd floor too. :)
Sean Avery suspended… When did you switch servers?
Yes, this is true.
Hah, looks like we did leave too soon!
Woah! cool. It totally work in Safari too! I had no idea you could do that.
Give it up Adam. That Calgary hash business is nonsense.
Is LaunchBar just an alternative to Quicksilver or is there a little more to it?
Do it do it!
Shit man, I tried that a couple months ago and they would not remove it. They said "it's impossible". I knew they were lying!
I don't think 0.303 is too crazy out of line for a 27". Is it?
Thanks for the tip! That's a steal!
Listen for bridges and train tracks. More accurate than GPS.
Dude you can always tap into my SimplyMedia if you're running short. The Hackintosh is even back online.
Fair enough. I think current situations amplify the perception of partisanship even if it may not be the case. (On both sides)
With respect, correct me if I'm wrong here. Isn't your statement about party attachment just a wee bit hypocritical?
I saw Neil play about 4 or 5 years ago. Prepare to experience rock, love, sorrow, and elderly ladies throwing their underwear
Yeah it was pretty bad, but we managed to get everything we needed pretty quickly and painlessly.
Yup I replied. Try Handbrake http://handbrake.fr/
Why do you do it to yourself?
Not quite what I had in mind, but you have inspired me for today's pick…
Thanks. Now I will never get that song out of my head and I'm going to have nightmares of Chris Dane Owens riding a dragon.
I am loving it so far!
That's a great album, but you should really listen to Elephant Shell. It's the newer one and it's an LP
Nice!
YES. On every single point. The Dude abides.
Let's start a bowling league. 10 Pin of course.
No. But this is. Mark me up for two.
Awesome! Thanks for setting up the venue for Twitmas!
How did you use that much badnwidth??? I'm lucky if I get above 200MB a month
http://www.realmacsoftware.com/littlesnapper/ It's still in private beta though.
I nominate @D4V for a Shorty Award in #hair because it is the largest and in chargest.
I nominate @beep for a Shorty Award in #humor because his tweets are bloody brilliant.
Nice work! I think we need a real domain name for it though
It's out? Awesome!
Er... I meant best of breed, not bread. Though strangely that doesn't really change the meaning at all.
Can I join? I wanted to present a powerpoint about streamlining best of bread integrations in enterprise-level mainframe solutions.
I'm thinking about it. I'll think about it some more. Then maybe I'll think about doing something. I might even think about sharing.
For Xmas or for the site in general?
is killing @rgertz in a heated game of Mario Kart
Nice! Thanks! I was just looking for something new for today.
Yup! We are also heading down on the 20th.
Gross.
Awesome.
I added myself when that first came out and I think I actually get MORE phone calls from solicitors now.
Welcome.
spoiled me again for Christmas!
Good call. Three days is more than enough time in this frozen country to appreciate SF. Especially this winter. Fly safe!
Are you heading to the Hat for the holidays?
Thanks for the shwag! Just got my Charged Up T in the mail. Christmas keeps getting better. http://bit.ly/UJ20
Happy birthday American Travis!
Good luck in your travels! It was nice to meet you while you were here.
No Prob!
If that's not animal abuse, I don't know what is. Terrible.
Heh, no worries just trying to get the heat off of me ;). WRT the avatar, you can make them here: http://bit.ly/ldoH
Hah! You totally implied that me eating them all would be punishment. What a jerk! :D
Twoosh!
Just stumbled onto my dad's Twitter account (@gertzr) he started a month ago. I don't think he quite gets it. I didn't even know he had one.
RT @ctoverdrive / @lexlimo: Wow, this the best explanation of what's happening with the #coalition http://bit.ly/doza
What the hell is with my brain today?
#monthofnewmusic Don Caballero - American Don
Just booked my SXSW flights. w00t!
At the car dealer to get some minor warranty work done and waiting for the "community shuttle". Somehow this feels like déjà vu.
There is something refreshing and exciting about committing revision 1.
Watching The Deer Hunter for the first time
Off to find myself a Unicorn.
And I still can't view detailed bills on Rogers.ca. That's about 5 months now. Frustration.
#monthofnewmusic Sylvie – Trees and Shade Are Our Only Fences
Inbox zero.
Good job Google. Reader is looking great.
#monthofnewmusic Mogwai - The Hawk Is Howling
Real. http://tinyurl.com/4ppq3e (via @stephenpeasley)
#monthofnewmusic Holy Fuck - LP
at market mall for some christmas shopping
Focus - Moving Waves #monthofnewmusic
#monthofnewmusic American Football - Self-titled. This one is for the album I missed yesterday.
Replaced my clunky old apple keyboard at the office with an aluminum one that was collecting dust at home. Best. Decision. Ever.
Holy crap Touch Grind on the iPhone is fun
Woodpigeon - Treasury Library Canada #monthofnewmusic
Really looking forward to trying out this Little Snapper beta today
Finder… you can stop being an unresponsive little baby and start working anytime now. You don't want to make me restart you again.
Drive home http://mtile.us/louderthan10
A new Pissington Rodcast! What a treat for the afternoon!
Someone really needs to make a good fake Gary Busey Twitter account and actually commit. I would, but I have a hard enough time with my own.
#monthofnewmusic The Kidcrash - New Ruins
Anyone need a Momentile invite? I gots a ton.
#monthofnewmusic The Dears - Missles
I have consumed far too much Indian food. This afternoon will not be good to me.
Hah! He has a song about the Ho! Awesome.
#monthofnewmusic Graham Wright - Lakes of Alberta (thx @steveperrylepan) Will buy the high quality version: http://bit.ly/2z5lBC
RT @weightshift / @patternclash: Silly people who drive on ice in Seattle down hills. Kinda comical http://tinyurl.com/5kmqug
Going to Costa Rica in February! (Wish I was there now).
This is probably the creepiest I've ever looked. http://flickr.com/photos/travinder/3109289259/ (from last night's ski sweater party)
Hey look, it's little slice of me. I've momentiled today… http://mtile.us/louderthan10
Ordering pizza online
OH: I've had fingers in my asshole since I was eight years old.
In the middle of an overly crazy debate that shouldn't be debated when overly drunk. People getting angry,
#monthofnewmusic Vampire Weekend - Vampire Weekend – I could not stand this album. Terrible. First album I really didn't like this month.
Rivers! Rodriguez! Report!
Holy Hannah! Christmas has come early. Just received another package filled with shirty goodness! Thanks @glass! http://bit.ly/pmyN

Made it home after a great night full of festivities and awesome people.
http://twitpic.com/ui3z - That's gotta hurt

Made it through holiday function 1 & 2. Just waiting for @TheStrayMuse to finish playing with her hair then we are off to #twitmas!

Veeraoke!
